backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions including color vars, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskModal.tsx: Modal for creating tasks with fields for title, why, energy, steps, estimates, and planned timeline.
frontend/src/components/BacklogTasksTabl: Table UI showing backlog tasks with energy, creation metadata, planned timeline, and completion time.
frontend/src/components/BrainDumpItemsTa: Renders a table of brain dump task items with energy labels, timestamps, and editable planned timelines.
frontend/src/components/BrainDumpView.ts: Manages brain dump text input, speech-to-text, task extraction, energy classification, and toggling between views.
frontend/src/components/EnergyCategorySe: Displays selectable energy category cards with icons, labels, and descriptions.
Simple button component that triggers a return-to-focus action.
frontend/src/components/StreakDetailsPan: Shows completed streak tasks with timestamps in a slide-up panel when open.
frontend/src/components/TaskEnergyAssist: Chat-style assistant that analyzes task text and suggests an energy category.
frontend/src/FocusExecutionApp.jsx: Main application component handling tasks, energy selection, Brain Dump, metadata normalization, timer, and UI views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Provides a React hook that manages browser speech recognition, tracking listening state, transcript, errors, and control methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, fonts, and animation utilities for the UI theme.
Parses freeform text into individual task strings using rules for bullets, speech patterns, separators, and cleanup.
frontend/src/lib/dateTimeFormat.ts: Utility functions to format timestamps into readable date, time, and timeline strings.
frontend/src/lib/streakCompletedTasksSto: Handles loading, saving, and clearing streak-completed tasks in localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/lib/taskEnergyClassifier.ts: Classifies task text into energy categories using keyword scoring and complexity/time heuristics.
frontend/src/lib/taskModels.ts: Defines task-related TypeScript interfaces and normalization helpers for backlog tasks and brain dump items.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, components, and animations with extended OKLCH-based styling.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s versioned state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records for a React-based focus/task management app. Captures storage models, UI requirements, Brain Dump behavior, and extension fields for tasks.
